channel.title: Comments on: T-SQL Tuesday #54: An Interview Invitation
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description:
That is an awesome question :) I could rage about an hour or more about what can be improved in SSIS.
This question can easily be extended to about any field.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: SQLSister
item.dc:creator: SQLSister
item.description: One of our favorites is "What do you hate about SSIS?" Trust me, if you don't immediately have an answer for this, you have not worked extensively with SSIS. SSIS is a great tool, but there is plenty that is annoying about it as well.
item.content:encoded: One of our favorites is “What do you hate about SSIS?” Trust me, if you don’t immediately have an answer for this, you have not worked extensively with SSIS. SSIS is a great tool, but there is plenty that is annoying about it as well.
